177 template <typename T>
178 class RenderableWidget : public ParameterWidget {
179 public:
180  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
183  RenderableWidget(CoreEngine* core, T* r, QWidget* parent = nullptr) :
184  ParameterWidget(core, parent),
185  m_renderable(r)
186  {
187  initialize();
188  }
189  virtual ~RenderableWidget() {
190  delete m_uniforms;
191  delete m_renderSettings;
192  }
193 
195  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
198 
199  virtual void update() override {
200  }
201 
203 
204 protected:
205 
206  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
209 
210  virtual void initializeWidgets() override {
211  m_uniforms = new RenderUniformsWidget(m_engine, *m_renderable);
212  m_renderSettings = new RenderSettingsWidget(m_engine, m_renderable->renderSettings());
213  //m_transparency = new TransparencyTypeWidget(m_engine, m_renderable->transparencyType());
214  }
215  virtual void initializeConnections() override {
216  }
217  virtual void layoutWidgets() override {
218  m_mainLayout = new QVBoxLayout();
219  m_mainLayout->setSpacing(0);
220  m_mainLayout->addWidget(new QLabel("Uniforms:"));
221  m_mainLayout->addWidget(m_uniforms);
222  //m_mainLayout->addWidget(new QLabel("Transparency:"));
223  //m_mainLayout->addWidget(m_transparency);
224  m_mainLayout->addWidget(new QLabel("Render Settings:"));
225  m_mainLayout->addWidget(m_renderSettings);
226  }
227 
228  //virtual void updateColor();
229 
230  //void setLabelColor();
231 
233 
234

240 
242  RenderUniformsWidget* m_uniforms;

245  RenderSettingsWidget* m_renderSettings;
246 
248  RenderLayerSelectWidget* m_renderLayers;
249 
251 
252 };
